document_data.name: Coral Princess
document_data.mainbody: The '''Coral Princess''' was a [[yikarian]] member of the [[Seven Sages]] and governor of the [[Sun's Eye]] province of the [[Land of the Yak-Men]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite dragon/241/Campaign Classics: The Roof of the World}}
document_data.Description: The Coral Princess was an [[albino]], a rarity among the yak-folk.
document_data.Activities: The Coral Princess ruled her province from the city of [[Lipo]] on the coast of [[Pearl Bay]]. Perhaps because of the distance separating her from the heart of the [[Yikarian Empire]], the Coral Princess was rather liberal and accepting compared to her kin. She traded freely with foreigners from the barbarian north, whereas most yak-folk of the "heartlands" would enslave any foreigner on sight.
